column5: I'm allways reading about fishing trips that were all right or could have been better or just down right bad,how about the best trip of your life,where was it,what did you catch,how was the lodge,did you fly in,what did it cost,did you go back and have a bad trip.I'm looking for the ultimate fishing trip for next year,so lets here from all of you.If any one is intrested in sharing a trip E-Mail me. Thanks Ed
